title: Sword in the Stone
alt: That seems like an awful lot of hassle when all I wanted was a cool sword.
transcript:
[Megan walks up to a sword in a stone.][Megan attempts to pull the sword out of the stone.][A beam of light and music plays as she removes the sword.][While standing with the swords a voice from the sky speaks in gray shaky letters:]
Celestial voice: The Throne of England is yours[Megan takes out her smart phone and searches:]
Wikipedia
England[Megan reads on her phone.][Megan starts to replace the sword back into the stone.]
